an easy method of preventing 
this gradual deterioration 
of Barometers -
The first fact has been 
proved <u>1st<\u> by the visible &
progressive ascent of <s>air-<\s>
bubbles of air on the surface of 
the Mercury of the new 
Barometer belonging to 
the Society in the construction of which very unusual 
pains were taken to ex-
clude its ingress; and 
also by the ascent of air 
in other Barometers of the 
best construction -
2dly by the gradual deterioration 
of the old Barometer of the 
Society; as proved by the 
Meteorological register from
